Johnson still available with price reduction.  Please use pm's if interested, assume pp f/f on any sales, prices include USPS priority shipping.  This link has scans of the individual cards:

[url]https://imgur.com/a/7SZU7ou[/url]

A. Joss Portrait, Piedmont 150 (small light stain at top center)- SGC 60 (5.0)- Sold

W. Johnson Hands at Chest, Sweet Caporal 350-460 - SGC 60 (5.0)- $3150

C. Bender Portrait, Sweet Caporal 350 - SGC 60 (5.0) - Sold

J. Titus Portrait, EPDG - SGC 70 (5.5) - Sold.... Pretty sure this is the highest Titus EPDG graded no psa's higher, the sgc pop report is impossible to be sure of anything.

G. Perring Portrait, American Beauty 350 w/ frame - PSA 5 - Sold


Thanks for looking.

Bob I.

PM sent on Bender.

Thank you,
-Trae
I’ll take the Perring. PM sent
